column4: how do I change the default output card for alsa? i finally (somehow, don't really know how) got my sound working after trying a week (!!!), but now, to be able to use it i have to manually change sound card in the options (XMMS is the only thing I've got working yet)
had system + gaim sound before last reboot
think it all started working when i installed xmms-mad that uninstalled gstreamer-packages
this is a question people are puzzling over---how to present this to the user
since 10 minutes ago, you don't need the "-d" any more
